derivation: a primitive root; properly, to strip; but used as denominative from H6189 (עָרֵל);
outline:
1. to remain uncircumcised, count uncircumcised, count as foreskin
    1. (Qal)
      1. to regard as uncircumcised
      2. to remain unharvested (fig.)
    2. (Niphal) to be counted as uncircumcised
kjv_def: count uncircumcised, foreskin to be uncovered.
strongs_def: to expose or remove the prepuce, whether literal (to go naked) or figurative (to refrain from using)
